name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Filbert Brownies
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on filbert brownies. —Ed Levine Filbert Brownies...

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, pulverize a couple handfuls of hazelnuts.
Melt 1 stick butter with 2 ounces chocolate. Meanwhile beat 2 eggs with 1 cup sugar and 1 teaspoon vanilla.
Combine 1/3 cup flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 2/3 cup ground nuts; blend into eggs. Stiffen with more hazelnut powder, if desired.
Bake in an 8-inch square pan for 30 minutes at 350°F.
